1.content: Let start with something simple. Are you a man, or a woman.
1.title: The beginning

info.brief_description: What will the life of being a servant be like.
info.description:
One day you get lost on a hike in the mountains. You almost lose your life in a fall till an Amazon saved you. Now you must serve her for life. What kind of things will these lead too.

Any kind of changes are allowed. TG, AR, AP, etc. Try to make chapters somewhat long and have fun.
info.pretty_title: Becoming a servant to an Amazon
